CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y software-properties-common python-software-properties git build-essential
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo oracle-java8-installer shared/accepted-oracle-license-v1-1 select true | debconf-set-selections &&   add-apt-repository -y ppa:webupd8team/java &&   apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y oracle-java8-installer &&   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&   rm -rf /var/cache/oracle-jdk7-installer
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo oracle-java7-installer shared/accepted-oracle-license-v1-1 select true | debconf-set-selections &&   apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y oracle-java7-installer &&   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&   rm -rf /var/cache/oracle-jdk7-installer
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: dpkg --add-architecture i386 && apt-get update && apt-get install -y --force-yes expect git wget libc6-i386 lib32stdc++6 lib32gcc1 lib32ncurses5 lib32z1 python curl
